test_scenarios.name: Verify Homepage Loads and Navigation
steps: Verify that the main navigation links (Hotels & Resorts, Offers, Hilton Honors, More) are present and clickable
test_scenarios.expected_result: Homepage loads completely and navigation links are visible and functional.

test_scenarios.name: Search for Hotels and View Results
steps: Enter a destination (e.g., 'New York') and dates (e.g., next weekend) in the search bar on the homepage
Verify that search results for 'New York' are displayed
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results page loads successfully with hotels in the specified destination.

test_scenarios.name: Book a Room (Happy Path)
steps: From the search results, select a hotel.
On the hotel page, select a room type and rate.
Enter required guest information (First name, Last name, Email)
test_scenarios.expected_result: Reservation is successfully created, and a confirmation page is displayed.
